name: Galaxy Battle (Siegehard Studios)
description:
Galaxy Battle is an unrelenting space survival game where you blast through alien spaceships!

Alone? Alone and in space?

Proceeding through hyper jump
SYSTEMS ENGAGED
See you on the other side

Eagle 1 to Alpha 4 do you read?
*Silence*
Eagle 1 to Alpha 1 do you read?
*Silence*
Eagle 1 to anyone! Do you read?
*Silence*

The hyperjump must have dropped you out somewhere else. But now you lost your squadron and your fleet. Flying through System to system trying to get to one place...The objective. But first, you have to meet up with your squadron, but where could they be?

Flying through space you have to dodge, fight and destroy waves of enemies who have honed in on your distress signal, The great war of the Xyrr has been raging for so long, the fight is being taken to them.

Destroy as many of them and their bases and cripple their army.

It's just you and your ship, in a strange and uncharted galaxy filled with bloodthirsty enemies all vying for you, avoid the dangers and surprises as you fly through space on a mission. Play through and discover what secrets the universe holds for you and your ship!
